description:
Fast and Powerful Uninstaller for Complete Removal of Programs

Fast and Powerful Uninstaller for Complete Removal of Programs
- Thorough removal of unwanted apps
- Real-time installation monitor
- Control apps that run at system startup
- Portable, multilingual and beautifully designed
- Startup: search (filter) the list of programs
- Startup: filter the list of programs using secondary toolbar categories (Registry/Start Menu/Tasks/UWP apps)
- Startup: improved look & feel of the list of programs
- Startup: display more startup apps coming from Windows Task Scheduler
- Slovak and Armenian translation update
- Improved Uninstall Wizard traces detection algorithms #168
- Fixed icon detection algorithm #150
- Dark theme related fixes #173
- Fixed dialog with running processes with significant amount of items
- Fixed running Install Tracker from a context menu on some systems (error 740)
